RUUE01
Animal Crossing: City Folk

SN Changer (20102 Bypass) [Full Metal Kirby]
C233D638 00000002
80C30004 38C600TT
90C30004 00000000
TT is a digit ADDED to your serial number. I suggest you to start with 01. If they ban you again then increase it to 02 and so on. If you change it again you'll need to make a new player to get it working or else you'll get an error when trying to connect to WiFi.

Make ABD Machine Account to 999,000,000 Bells (All Players) [conanac]
206E23C0 00000810
4A000000 90000000
18E27D3C 3B8B87C0
200386C0 00000000
E0000000 80008000
(Push A and Plus buttons to execute)

Make Wallet to Have 99,000 Bells (All Players) [conanac]
206E23C0 00001010
4A000000 90000000
18E27D34 000182B8
200386C0 00000000
E0000000 80008000
(Push Minus and Plus buttons to execute)

Change Nook's Shop (between Nookington's and Nook 'n Go) [conanac]
206E23C0 00004200
42000000 90000000
04E89CA0 00000001
04E89CA4 00000001
E0000000 80008000
206E23C0 00004100
42000000 90000000
04E89CA0 00000003
04E89CA4 00000003
E0000000 80008000
(Press C and 1 buttons for Nook 'n Go, and press C and 2 buttons for Nookington's; You need to go in and out of the houses or gates to see the changes; You could replace 1 (in lines 3 and 4) and 3 (in lines 8 and 9) to other numbers (0 for Nook's Cranny and 2 for NookWay)

Always Have 9999999 Bells (works for any player) [brkirch]
